lines.text: I mean, that's pretty obvious, right? There was that whole fire situation.
The hay went up in flames, and that burned down the table, so that ritual couldn't go through.
Th-that kind of logic...! That doesn't mean anything!
...Care to explain? It looks pretty open-and-shut to me.
You can't c-corner me with that! You're forgetting a key possibility!
Th-that ritual! They could've- they could've already performed it!
Dude, no. The pentagram's blank, so...
So nothing! Th-that ritual- it only needs- it's not that complicated! No runes!
You're assuming that it's- that it's- that Slick showed up b-before the ritual! Without evidence!
But- no, there's no way it could've happened before Slick arrived!
Bl-bluffing! You can't- you can't prove that!
